snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar news. Thursday's selection includes several items about Facebook in the wake of its filing for a public stock offering, including the unclear nature...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar news. Thursday's selection includes several items about Facebook in the wake of its filing for a public stock offering, including the unclear nature of its ad business, two major ways its revenue is changing and a theory that it will not be the one big player in social media.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Facebook's Ads, Revenue and Market Fragmentation
